filterText.description: The placeholder text for the filter input textbox. Defaults to 'filter' if no value is set.

refineHeadingText.description: The text for the Level 2 Heading for the content browser facet list. Defaults to 'Refine Learning Content' if no value is set.

summary.description: The summary text for the content browser, appearing underneath the Level 1 Heading.

title.description: The text for the Level 1 Heading for the content browser.
